name: Live Or Die (Pedestrian Tactics)
description:
In this boring world your luck is entirely determined by a roll of the dice. In order to increase your luck you’re on the hunt for the 12-sided die. It’s a giant fetch quest. This was designed for the GMTK Game Jam’s “Roll The Dice” prompt. Because I didn't have proper export profile I am uploading my completed Godot 4.4 project so at least there’s something on time. It works entirely.

This was built in the last 24 hours of the game jam as a challenge to see how fast and narrow I could implement the directive. The artwork, sounds, and music were built specifically for this game. Thanks to Griffin Dziok and Nicholas Glenn for helping me out with a few assets!

Since closing I was able to publish builds. They are located here if you’re interested https://www.dropbox.com/sh/bbnshgyj7k6cuf9/AACBlllT2WTWYUOcf050aokXa?dl=0
